location.title: What do you need to recycle?

about.title: About this service
about.intro: Powered by RecycleNow.com, this tool can be used to search and find recycling locations throughout the United Kingdom.

becomeAPartner.title: Add this tool to your website
becomeAPartner.description: It’s been created as an embeddable widget that can be added to any website to help visitors discover more recycling options. For example, a beverage manufacturer could use the tool to show places to recycle drinks cans.

feedback.title: Improving this service
feedback.description: We’re always looking to improve this tool and would be interested to hear about your experience whilst using it, good or bad.
